title: Lab Tools & Resources
text: We share pipelines, protocols, and interactive apps here.

title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to ADALab 👋
We are a research group focused on Systems Immunology, Proteomics, and Cancer Biology.
💡 Explore our lab: - 👩‍🔬 People - 🔬 Projects - 📚 Publications - 📰 News - ⚙️ Tools - 📬 Contact

title: Publications
text:
Publications
Here are our lab’s publications:


Fitzpatrick-Schmidt, T., Mansouri, A., Adamec, J., Klein, J., Coleman, L., Edwards, K. N., … Edwards, S. (2025). Proteomic analysis of chronic binge alcohol-induced hippocampal and anterior cingulate cortex neuroadaptations in simian immunodeficiency virus (SIV)-infected female rhesus macaques. Journal of Neuroimmune Pharmacology, 20(1), 16.

title: Instruments
text:
Instrumentation


The Proteomics and Metabolomics Core at LSUHSC is well equipped for a variety of experimental samples with instrumentation for liquid and gas chromatography, mass spectrometry, MALDI tissue imaging, Biomarker Analysis, Western Blotting, Multiplex Imaging, and Surface Plasmon Resonance.


 






This page requires JavaScript to load _data/instruments.yml.

title: About ADALab
text:
About ADALab
We investigate how viral infections and co-infections shape the immune system and cancer progression.
Principal Investigator: Dr. Jiri Adamec
Institution: LSU HEALTH NEW ORLEANS / LSU LCMC Health Cancer Center]
